items.headline: Another 1,000% gainer: CaliberCos surges on digital-asset purchase, a day after Eightco’s 3,000% gain
items.summary_en: The 3,000% surge in Eightco Holdings’ stock on the purchase of a digital asset that can be acquired independently is just the latest example of what one analyst calls “market madness.”

items.headline: Fed is almost certain to cut rates by 25 basis points after months of debate. Why are so many people so unhappy about it?

items.headline: Why JPMorgan is warning the Fed rate cut everyone expects could sink stocks
